Name: 1.5.2: Better code language detection, a new Information View and more!
Update Summary: Pieces for Developers gets a heavy upgrade today as we start to polish the UI and roll out updated ML models. We're proud to launch Information View!
MainBody:
Pieces for Developers gets a heavy upgrade today as we start to polish the UI and roll out updated machine learning models. We’d love your feedback - just hit [ Shift + ! ] from the Pieces app or email support@pieces.app.

Pieces for Developers

Pieces for Developers is the core user-facing Pieces application. Get started for free here.

Adding Pieces

  • Language classification - Pieces auto-classifies your snippets by language using machine learning models. In this release, we pushed a couple major upgrades:
    Improved code language classification predictions
    We now display the confidence level on our code language classification
  • Better image error handling - you’ll now receive an error message when trying to upload an unsupported image type
  • Image size constraints - images uploaded to the app must be under 1MB

Managing Pieces

  • Information View - view more information related to your snippets in one handy view, including its description, related links, tags and origin
  • Fixed an off-by-one bug with code selections when copying

Installing & Configuring Pieces

  • PFD will stay running even when the user hits the close button on the window
  • Up to 35% faster bootup performance to get you into the app faster

Pieces API

Everything we develop is on top of the Pieces API. We're excited to welcome third-party developers who want to build applications on top of our infrastructure. Email us at support@pieces.app for more details.
